name: Wellness Care
des: Our wellness programs include: comprehensive physical exam; internal and external parasite testing.

name: Anesthetic Monitoring
des: Your pet will be examined during check in to ensure that he or she is in top shape for surgery that day.

name: Nutritional Counseling
des: Some pets require special prescription food and all pets benefit from a balanced diet.

name: Pain Management
des: We understand that our patients feel pain and discomfort under the same circumstances as people do.

name: Vaccination Care
des: When a baby kitten or puppy is born, its immune system is not yet mature; the baby is wide open for infection.

name: Dental Care
des: Regular dental cleanings are important in maintaining not only your petâ€™s teeth but his or her overall health as well.
